tool_description: Asynchronous high-load API for recognition of proof of identity documents (ICAO 9303, ~200 countries).
name: Passport/Visa/Id OCR
title: Passport/Visa/Id OCR

api_list.name: mrz_post
api_list.description: This point starts the processing of documents and returns a point by which you can follow the progress and the result in the end.
